newsitem.title: BRAZIL: RESEARCH ALERT-Telebras still a strong buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT-Telebras still a strong buy.

text.p: -- Morgan Stanley said in a report it was maintaining its strong buy rating on Brazilian state-owned telecom company
-- It considered good for Telebras that Brazil's highest court rejected a claim by opposition parties contesting the sale of B Band cellular concessions.
-- "This decision is good for Telebras because it clears the way for the sale of the B Band cellular concessions," it said.

-- In addition, it said Telebras continues to be the most attractive stock in Latin America, "as it offers a combination of strong growth prospects, attractive valuation and positive regulatory momentum."
-- Telebras preferred shares were trading at 114.10 reais, up 0.62 percent, on the Sao Paulo bourse.
